entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:09 a.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.0Â°C

Observed at: White Rock 7:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. Temperature steady near 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 in the morning except 60 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
